description: Apple crisps are a healthy and quick snack option to satisfy your sweet tooth naturally.
name: Apple & Cinnamon Crisps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the apple using a mandolin. Place the sliced apple in a bowl with the oil and cinnamon and toss to coat each slice well.

Heat the air fryer to 170Â°C and add the apple slices to the basket in a single layer, working in batches. Cook 12 minutes, shaking occasionally. Set aside and repeat with the remaining apple slices. The apples will crisp up more as they cool.
